name: The Arlockstown
description:
Set in 1868 town "The Arlockstown" is slowly dying. Your goal is to destroy 5 cursed fires to save your town.

Download for free or donate!

WARNING: Loud game!

It's best played in dark room with headphones on.

It should take you around 5-10 minutes to complete this game. 

This is my first horror game. Sorry for my english if there is grammar mistake anywhere! English is not my main language!

Credits: https://twitter.com/DevVictor2/status/1553682918416973824?s=20&t=o_fiTdOaaUIzq7g...
